tjvmuO_D.title: Kidogo Mobile App Design
tjvmuO_D.desc: The Kidogo Mobile App was designed for folks with Kenyan women with limited literacy - because of this iconography and the UI needed to be instantly understandable despite a significant language and culture barrier.
tjvmuO_D.impact: Extensive research and vetting went in to the design work, the final product a mix of English, Swahili, iconography, and audio cues - all easily understood by users.

UkgawL_J.title: HPGella Logo Design
UkgawL_J.desc: One of Seattle's top Pharma-testimonial companies needed a dazzling and contemporary logo to be the face of their annual morale booster event
UkgawL_J.impact: For two years over 100 branded totes and a 6x6 foot banner served as an emblem for a day-long Coachella-like micro music festival.
